pageContext.claim: “We actually sold $300 billion worth of equipment and other things.  And I think that number is going to be quadrupled very quickly.  So that's over a trillion dollars' worth of stuff.”
pageContext.analysis: This is not accurate. Many of the arrangements are non-binding memorandums rather than legal contracts, valued at $250 billion. Still, it reamins to be seen if the initial contracts will come to fruition let alone generate a trillion dollars as Trump claims. And despite the claims of success, the trade deficit with China has grown 7 percent from January to October, according to a December report from the Commerce Department.
